speaker: U
text: Please provide me information on the restaurant one seven.

speaker: S
text: Restaurant one seven serves British food in the centre area at moderate prices. Would you like to book there?

speaker: U
text: Yes I would like to book a table for 3 people at 20:00 on Wednesday.

speaker: S
text: I have you booked for a table of 3 at 20:00 on Wednesday, would you like a confirmation receipt?

speaker: U
text: Yes, please give me the reference number.

speaker: S
text: I am sorry the Booking was unsuccessful can I help you find another place in the same area and price range?

speaker: U
text: I am disappointed but willing to try another place in the same area and price range. What do you recommend?

speaker: S
text: There are 21 different restaurants that follow those criteria. Did you want to stay within the british theme or try something else?

speaker: U
text: Yes, we can stick to British please

speaker: S
text: The Oak Bistro was available to be booked, your reference number is EO5VQ6EJ.

speaker: U
text: Can you tell me if their eton mess is delicious?
